name: Oh My Circuits!
description:
Oh My Circuits! ©, 3D Co-Op SplitScreen, for 2 players. You should cooperate to complete puzzles.

P1:  A-D-W-S 

P2:  <-  -> Up Down

Press P1: F or P2: K top camera

Press P1: G or P2: L camera back normal

Developers:
